'''Charles Hall''' is the son of [[Courtney Hall|Courtney]] and [[Doug Hall]], who was born extremely prematurely.

==History==
Charles was part of a quadruplet pregnancy. Two of the others had conjoined vessels that had to be separated with fetal surgery. When his mom, [[Courtney Hall|Courtney]] went into labor at 23 weeks, Charles had to be delivered. However, [[Arizona Robbins|Arizona]] was able to stop labor and delay the other three births while Charles was taken to the NICU, where he was oxygenating well despite his prematurity.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was the only male fetus in the pregnancy.
